attributes.additional_details:
Ensure that Lytham Sea Scouts has access to storage and changing facilities at Fairhaven Lake (FY8) so that they can continue to provide exciting water based opportunities for the children of  Lytham and the surrounding area

This is currently threatened by Fylde Borough Councils Fairhaven Development Plan. Which aim is to improve the lake for local people but not the Sea Scouts who will have no facilities.

In a time when we are encouraging young people to be active removing these facilities will effectively close the Sea Scout Unit

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
